name: Tailor Tales
description: Play as an aspiring fashion designer with your own boutique and experience a heart pounding romance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 700 MB available space
